it.polito.pd2.WF
Interface WorkflowReader

public interface WorkflowReader

An interface for reading the data associated with a workflow.

Method Summary
 ActionReader getAction(String name)
          Gives the action with the given name.
 Set<ActionReader> getActions()
          Gives the actions defined for this workflow.
 String getName()
          Gives the name of the workflow (a string made of alphanumeric characters only, where the first character is alphabetic).
 Set<ProcessReader> getProcesses()
          Gives the known processes that instantiate this workflow.
 

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Gives the name of the workflow (a string made of alphanumeric characters only, where the first character is alphabetic).

Returns:
the name of the workflow

getActions

Set<ActionReader> getActions()
Gives the actions defined for this workflow.

Returns:
a set of interfaces for accessing information about defined actions

getProcesses

Set<ProcessReader> getProcesses()
Gives the known processes that instantiate this workflow.

Returns:
a set of interfaces for accessing the information of known processes that instantiate this workflow

getAction

ActionReader getAction(String name)
Gives the action with the given name.

Parameters:
name - the name (a string made of alphanumeric characters only, where the first character is alphabetic)
Returns:
an interface for accessing information about the action with the given name or null if this action is not in the workflow.
